[[inst_v_shfl_up]]
==== V.SHFL.UP

*Syntax:* v.shfl.up SrcL.<T>, SrcR.<T>, SrcP.<T>, ->Dst.<W>

*Description:* Shuffle (up): permutes vector elements using register indices.
